Articles.Content: Not what i meant. My hill.
Yes, of course, the former "your" hill crushes you.

I fire a blue portal under the hill and a yellow one under a cloud that is above my plot of land. My hill.

(Canonically different people have different portal colors. Chell's are blue and orange, atlas and P-body have red and orange and something else. It's obvious where I got my colors from.)

I disappear into a wormhole. I make a new hill across the universe.

My lonely hill.

It wasn't a wormhole, it was just a sink.

Sewers hill.
I crawl out of the sewer, covered in scum, and everyone is afraid of my stink, a defense move at the price of my dignity. my hill.
Two Words: Gas Mask. I still have my Aperture Science- brand Hill.
brand Hill falls into a portal and disappears with its "owner".
The hill suddenly explodes, killing [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/). I make a new one. My hill.

I send in the transparent kebabs to destroy your hill. 

My kebab-filled crater
I use the Infinity Gauntlet to destroy half of all hills.
Halfinity Hills are for sale.

I buy your hill store.

My profitable business.
I make a hill on Fust. My distant hill.
As the old hill gets lost in infinity, currently no hill.
New hill on Hale. My low-gravity hill.

Hill dissipates due to low gravity.

A hill nebula.

> 
> 
> 7 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Hill dissipates due to low gravity.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> A hill nebula.
> 

The hill was reinforced with graphene strings, this never happens. My hill.
A cloud of graphene strings marks the place where once ago there was a hill.
I turn the cloud of graphene strings into a few hundred kilograms of graphite and hurl it at the earth, and make a base in the walls of the crater it forms.
It's a pity the crater is far from land, and sinks twice per day due to the tides.
I throw your pretty NOT base into Kerbil

I shake off the raw sewage, and I jump into the air and cut all of  the contenders for the hill into micron-size bits with a sword that looks like the the sunstorm saber, but red.

my hill, with powdered forum-users.

> 
> 
> Just now, Fraston said:
> 
> 
> I shake off the raw sewage, and I jump into the air and cut all of  the contenders for the hill into micron-size bits with a sword that looks like the the sunstorm saber, but red.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> my hill, with powdered forum-users.
> 

I am imoervious to such things. My hill. With other powdered forum users.
I install BDArmoury and decide to let my sister "play around" with my land battleship. My hill+crater.
